text: (throbbing digital music)

- Hi, I'm Sounil Yu, creator
of the Cyber Defense Matrix.

Security is a shared
responsibility between AWS and you.

While AWS is responsible
for security of the cloud,
it is up to you to ensure

that you're keeping everything
that you do on AWS secure.

You are responsible for
security in the cloud.
To help you with that responsibility,
AWS Marketplace has several
cloud security posture management
independent software vendors
that offer tools to help you
continuously monitor your usage of AWS,

identifying gaps between
your desired security posture
and your actual security posture,
to quickly address any gaps.
Cloud security posture management tools

compliment cloud workload
protection platforms.
While CWPP secures workloads,

CSPM tools help you
secure the infrastructure
on which you run your workloads.
Specifically, CSPM tools

detect cloud infrastructure
misconfigurations

that can lead to compliance
violations and data leakage.
Using AWS APIs, these tools can monitor
for security or policy violations
and give you the option
to quickly remediate any violations

to bring your environment
back into compliance.

Many CSPM tools come prebuilt
with compliance libraries

that reflect common
standards or best practices,
such as CIS benchmarks, SOC 2, PCI,
NIST 800-53, and HIPAA,

to verify that
configurations are compliant.

Through CSPM solutions,
you can quickly automate

the implementation and adherence
to security best practices.
